EmailTemplate.description: Email to fellow to notify that their application has been received. India fellows.
EmailTemplate.name: Application Received - India
EmailTemplate.subject: Climate Corps Application Received
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Fellow_Application__c.Applicant_First_Name__c},
Thank you for submitting an application for Climate Corps! We have received your completed application and will be in touch soon.
Interviews will begin in September for candidates that apply prior to the early deadline (20th August 2023). Applications for late deadline will be opened in October. For more information about our recruitment timeline, please visit our website.
You may log back into the portal at any time to update your contact information and resume, and to see the status of your application in the top right-hand corner. Follow this link to log in: https://environmentaldefensefund.my.site.com/EDFCCFellowPortal/s/login
Best,
The Climate Corps Team
edfclimatecorps.apply@edf.org
